entry.title: Russians Have Already Started Hybrid War, Ukraine Says
entry.content: For Russia to create havoc in Ukraine, it may not need to launch an all-out invasion. Ukrainian officials say that Moscow is stepping up a destabilization campaign involving cyberattacks, economic disruption and, most recently, hundreds of false bomb threats.

entry.title: Biden Warns Putin of 'Swift and Severe Costs' of Invading Ukraine
entry.content: The phone discussion between President Biden and Russian President Vladimir Putin yielded “no fundamental change,” a U.S. official said. Washington ordered most embassy staff out of the country and Moscow also began withdrawing its diplomatic presence there.
